    declare_counter ring_sicily
    declare_counter ring_denmark
    declare_counter ring_milan
    declare_counter ring_normans
    declare_counter ring_turks
    declare_counter ring_scotland
    declare_counter ring_timurids
    declare_counter ring_byzantium
    declare_counter ring_moors
    declare_counter ring_hungary
    declare_counter ring_norway
    declare_counter ring_saxons
    declare_counter ring_ireland
    declare_counter ring_mongols
    declare_counter ring_teutonic_order
    declare_counter ring_aztecs
    declare_counter ring_france
    declare_counter ring_england
    declare_counter ring_poland
    declare_counter ring_hre
    declare_counter ring_portugal
    declare_counter ring_venice
    declare_counter ring_gundabad
    declare_counter ring_spain
    declare_counter ring_khand
    declare_counter ring_russia
    declare_counter sauron_return
    
    ;this monitor is responsible for counting how long a AI faction has got the ring and implementing the various consequences
    
    declare_counter ring_faction
    
    monitor_event CharacterTurnStart HasAncType relic_ring 
        and not CharacterIsLocal
        log always --------------------------- ai has ring consequences ------------------------
        if I_CompareCounter ring_end == 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_sicily == 1
        and I_EventCounter destroy_ring_ai = 0
        and I_EventCounter gondor_keeps_ring = 0
            inc_counter ring_sicily 1
            set_event_counter one_ring_gondor 1
            set_counter ring_faction 1
            if I_CompareCounter ring_sicily >= 48
                set_counter ring_sicily 0
                if RandomPercent <= 70
                    and I_EventCounter destroy_impossible = 0
                    historic_event destroy_ring_ai factions { turks, saxons, ireland, mongols, }
                    console_command remove_ancillary denethor_1 one_ring
                    console_command remove_ancillary dinenion_1 one_ring
                    console_command remove_ancillary angbor_1 one_ring
                    console_command remove_ancillary forlong_1 one_ring
                    console_command remove_ancillary golasgil_1 one_ring
                    console_command remove_ancillary hirluin_1 one_ring
                    console_command remove_ancillary iorthon_1 one_ring
                    console_command remove_ancillary orodreth_1 one_ring
                    console_command remove_ancillary boromir_1 one_ring
                    console_command remove_ancillary faramir_1 one_ring
                    console_command remove_ancillary gondor_attackers_m one_ring
                    console_command remove_ancillary gondor_attackers_2 one_ring
                    console_command remove_ancillary gondor_attackers_3 one_ring
                    set_event_counter ring_transfer 1
                end_if
                if I_EventCounter destroy_ring_ai = 0
                    historic_event gondor_keeps_ring factions { all, }
                    add_money sicily 10000
                    increment_kings_purse sicily 2000
                    set_faction_standing sicily england -1
                    set_faction_standing sicily france -1
                    set_faction_standing sicily spain -1
                    set_faction_standing sicily venice -1
                    set_faction_standing sicily hre -1
                    set_faction_standing sicily portugal -1
                    set_faction_standing sicily aztecs -1
                    set_faction_standing sicily poland -1
                    set_faction_standing sicily saxons -1
                    set_faction_standing sicily mongols -1
                    set_faction_standing sicily ireland -1
                    set_faction_standing sicily turks -1
                    set_faction_standing england sicily -1
                    set_faction_standing france sicily -1
                    set_faction_standing spain sicily -1
                    set_faction_standing venice sicily -1
                    set_faction_standing hre sicily -1
                    set_faction_standing portugal sicily -1
                    set_faction_standing aztecs sicily -1
                    set_faction_standing poland sicily -1
                    set_faction_standing saxons sicily -1
                    set_faction_standing mongols sicily -1
                    set_faction_standing ireland sicily -1
                    set_faction_standing turks sicily -1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance sicily england war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance sicily papal_states war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance sicily france war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance sicily spain war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance sicily venice war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance sicily hre war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance sicily portugal war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance sicily aztecs war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance sicily poland war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance sicily saxons war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance sicily mongols war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance sicily ireland war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance sicily turks war
                    if I_CharacterExists denethor_1
                        console_command remove_ancillary denethor_1 one_ring
                        console_command remove_ancillary dinenion_1 one_ring
                        console_command remove_ancillary angbor_1 one_ring
                        console_command remove_ancillary forlong_1 one_ring
                        console_command remove_ancillary golasgil_1 one_ring
                        console_command remove_ancillary hirluin_1 one_ring
                        console_command remove_ancillary iorthon_1 one_ring
                        console_command remove_ancillary orodreth_1 one_ring
                        console_command remove_ancillary boromir_1 one_ring
                        console_command remove_ancillary faramir_1 one_ring
                        console_command remove_ancillary gondor_attackers_m one_ring
                        console_command remove_ancillary gondor_attackers_2 one_ring
                        console_command remove_ancillary gondor_attackers_3 one_ring
                        console_command give_ancillary denethor_1 one_ring
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_denmark == 1
        and I_EventCounter destroy_ring_ai = 0
        and I_EventCounter da_keeps_ring = 0
            inc_counter ring_denmark 1
            set_event_counter one_ring_da 1
            set_counter ring_faction 2
            if I_CompareCounter ring_denmark >= 63
                set_counter ring_denmark 0
                if RandomPercent <= 90
                    and I_EventCounter destroy_impossible = 0
                    historic_event destroy_ring_ai factions { turks, saxons, ireland, mongols, }
                    console_command remove_ancillary adrahil_1 one_ring
                    console_command remove_ancillary amrothos_1 one_ring
                    console_command remove_ancillary mistven_1 one_ring
                    console_command remove_ancillary elphir_1 one_ring
                    console_command remove_ancillary imrahil_1 one_ring
                    console_command remove_ancillary erchirion_1 one_ring
                    console_command remove_ancillary DA_attackers_1 one_ring
                    console_command remove_ancillary DA_attackers_4 one_ring
                    set_event_counter ring_transfer 1
                end_if
                if I_EventCounter destroy_ring_ai = 0
                    historic_event da_keeps_ring factions { all, }
                    add_money denmark 10000
                    increment_kings_purse denmark 2000
                    set_faction_standing denmark england -1
                    set_faction_standing denmark france -1
                    set_faction_standing denmark spain -1
                    set_faction_standing denmark venice -1
                    set_faction_standing denmark hre -1
                    set_faction_standing denmark portugal -1
                    set_faction_standing denmark aztecs -1
                    set_faction_standing denmark poland -1
                    set_faction_standing denmark saxons -1
                    set_faction_standing denmark mongols -1
                    set_faction_standing denmark ireland -1
                    set_faction_standing denmark turks -1
                    set_faction_standing england denmark -1
                    set_faction_standing france denmark -1
                    set_faction_standing spain denmark -1
                    set_faction_standing venice denmark -1
                    set_faction_standing hre denmark -1
                    set_faction_standing portugal denmark -1
                    set_faction_standing aztecs denmark -1
                    set_faction_standing poland denmark -1
                    set_faction_standing saxons denmark -1
                    set_faction_standing mongols denmark -1
                    set_faction_standing ireland denmark -1
                    set_faction_standing turks denmark -1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance denmark england war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance denmark papal_states war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance denmark france war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance denmark spain war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance denmark venice war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance denmark hre war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance denmark portugal war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance denmark aztecs war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance denmark poland war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance denmark saxons war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance denmark mongols war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance denmark ireland war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance denmark turks war
                    if I_CharacterExists adrahil_1
                        console_command remove_ancillary adrahil_1 one_ring
                        console_command remove_ancillary amrothos_1 one_ring
                        console_command remove_ancillary mistven_1 one_ring
                        console_command remove_ancillary elphir_1 one_ring
                        console_command remove_ancillary erchirion_1 one_ring
                        console_command remove_ancillary imrahil_1 one_ring
                        console_command remove_ancillary DA_attackers_1 one_ring
                        console_command remove_ancillary DA_attackers_4 one_ring
                        console_command give_ancillary adrahil_1 one_ring
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_milan == 1
        and I_EventCounter destroy_ring_ai = 0
        and I_EventCounter rohan_keeps_ring = 0
            inc_counter ring_milan 1
            set_event_counter one_ring_rohan 1
            set_counter ring_faction 3
            if I_CompareCounter ring_milan >= 57
                set_counter ring_milan 0
                if RandomPercent <= 60

    declare_counter ring_held_destroy
    declare_counter ring_held_saruman
    
    ;AI ring destroy script

    monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType slave
        and I_EventCounter destroy_ring_ai > 0
        log always --------------------------- ai ring destroy script------------------------
        set_event_counter mordor_ring_ai 0
        set_event_counter saruman_ring_ai 0
        if I_CompareCounter ring_end == 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_CharacterExists elrond_1
            and I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
            and I_EventCounter ring_given = 0
            console_command remove_ancillary elrond_1 wisdom
            console_command give_ancillary elrond_1 one_ring
            set_event_counter ring_transfer 0
            set_event_counter ring_given 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_he 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_elrond 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_ai 1
        end_if
        if I_CharacterExists elrond_1
            and not I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
            and I_EventCounter ring_given = 0
            console_command remove_ancillary elrond_1 wisdom
            console_command give_ancillary elrond_1 one_ring
            set_event_counter ring_transfer 0
            set_event_counter ring_given 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_he 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_elrond 1
        end_if
        if I_CharacterExists gandalf_2
            and I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
            and I_EventCounter ring_given = 0
            console_command remove_ancillary gandalf_2 wisdom
            console_command give_ancillary gandalf_2 one_ring
            set_event_counter ring_transfer 0
            set_event_counter ring_given 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_nd 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_gandalf2 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_ai 1
        end_if
        if I_CharacterExists gandalf_2
            and not I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
            and I_EventCounter ring_given = 0
            console_command remove_ancillary gandalf_2 wisdom
            console_command give_ancillary gandalf_2 one_ring
            set_event_counter ring_transfer 0
            set_event_counter ring_given 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_nd 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_gandalf2 1
        end_if
        if I_CharacterExists gandalf_1 
            and I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
            and I_EventCounter ring_given = 0
            console_command remove_ancillary gandalf_1 wisdom
            console_command give_ancillary gandalf_1 one_ring
            set_event_counter ring_transfer 0
            set_event_counter ring_given 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_nd 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_gandalf1 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_ai 1
        end_if
        if I_CharacterExists gandalf_1 
            and not I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
            and I_EventCounter ring_given = 0
            console_command remove_ancillary gandalf_1 wisdom
            console_command give_ancillary gandalf_1 one_ring
            set_event_counter ring_transfer 0
            set_event_counter ring_given 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_nd 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_gandalf1 1
        end_if
        if I_CharacterExists aragorn_1 
            and I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
            and I_EventCounter ring_given = 0
            console_command remove_ancillary aragorn_1 elf_friend
            console_command give_ancillary aragorn_1 one_ring
            set_event_counter ring_transfer 0
            set_event_counter ring_given 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_nd 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_aragorn 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_ai 1
        end_if
        if I_CharacterExists aragorn_1 
            and not I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
            and I_EventCounter ring_given = 0
            console_command remove_ancillary aragorn_1 elf_friend
            console_command give_ancillary aragorn_1 one_ring
            set_event_counter ring_transfer 0
            set_event_counter ring_given 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_nd 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_aragorn 1
        end_if
        if I_CharacterExists celeborn_1 
            and I_IsFactionAIControlled ireland
            and I_EventCounter ring_given = 0
            console_command remove_ancillary celeborn_1 wisdom
            console_command give_ancillary celeborn_1 one_ring
            set_event_counter ring_transfer 0
            set_event_counter ring_given 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_lorien 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_celeborn 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_ai 1
        end_if
        if I_CharacterExists celeborn_1 
            and not I_IsFactionAIControlled ireland
            and I_EventCounter ring_given = 0
            console_command remove_ancillary celeborn_1 wisdom
            console_command give_ancillary celeborn_1 one_ring
            set_event_counter ring_transfer 0
            set_event_counter ring_given 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_lorien 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_celeborn 1
        end_if
        if I_CharacterExists glorfindel_1 
            and I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
            and I_EventCounter ring_given = 0
            console_command remove_ancillary glorfindel_1 wisdom
            console_command give_ancillary glorfindel_1 one_ring
            set_event_counter ring_transfer 0
            set_event_counter ring_given 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_he 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_glorfindel 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_ai 1
        end_if
        if I_CharacterExists glorfindel_1 
            and not I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
            and I_EventCounter ring_given = 0
            console_command remove_ancillary glorfindel_1 wisdom
            console_command give_ancillary glorfindel_1 one_ring
            set_event_counter ring_transfer 0
            set_event_counter ring_given 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_he 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_glorfindel 1
        end_if
        if I_CharacterExists cirdan_1 
            and not I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
            and I_EventCounter ring_given = 0
            console_command remove_ancillary cirdan_1 wisdom
            console_command give_ancillary cirdan_1 one_ring
            set_event_counter ring_transfer 0
            set_event_counter ring_given 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_he 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_cirdan 1
        end_if
        if I_CharacterExists cirdan_1 
            and I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
            and I_EventCounter ring_given = 0
            console_command remove_ancillary cirdan_1 wisdom
            console_command give_ancillary cirdan_1 one_ring
            set_event_counter ring_transfer 0
            set_event_counter ring_given 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_he 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_cirdan 1
            set_event_counter ring_given_ai 1
        end_if
        inc_counter ring_held_destroy 1
    end_monitor
    
    declare_counter udun_check
    
    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart
    
        if I_EventCounter ring_destroyed = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        
        if I_EventCounter destroy_impossible = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        
        if I_SettlementOwner Udun = poland
            set_counter udun_check 0
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Udun = gundabad
            set_counter udun_check 0
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Udun = england
            set_counter udun_check 0
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Udun = hre
            set_counter udun_check 0
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Udun = venice
            set_counter udun_check 0
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Udun = portugal
            set_counter udun_check 0
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Udun = russia
            set_counter udun_check 0
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Udun = france
            set_counter udun_check 0
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Udun = aztecs
            set_counter udun_check 0
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Udun = spain
            set_counter udun_check 0
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Udun = slave
            set_counter udun_check 0
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Udun = khand
        and I_EventCounter blue_wizards_fail = 1
            set_counter udun_check 0
        end_if
    end_monitor
    
    monitor_event FactionTurnEnd
    
        if I_EventCounter ring_destroyed = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        
        if I_EventCounter destroy_impossible = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        
        set_counter udun_check 1
        
    end_monitor
    
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart I_EventCounter ring_given_ai = 1
    and I_EventCounter ring_bearer_faction = 1
    and I_CompareCounter ring_held_destroy >= 25
    
        if I_EventCounter ring_destroyed = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        
        if I_EventCounter destroy_impossible = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        
        if I_SettlementOwner Udun = saxons
        and I_EventCounter ring_given_he = 1
        and I_EventCounter ring_udun = 1
            set_event_counter ring_assault 1
            set_event_counter ring_gate 1
        end_if
        
        if I_SettlementOwner Udun = turks
        and I_EventCounter ring_given_nd = 1
        and I_EventCounter ring_udun = 1
            set_event_counter ring_assault 1
            set_event_counter ring_gate 1
        end_if
        
        if I_SettlementOwner Udun = ireland
        and I_EventCounter ring_given_lorien = 1
        and I_EventCounter ring_udun = 1
            set_event_counter ring_assault 1
            set_event_counter ring_gate 1
        end_if
        
        if I_CompareCounter udun_check = 1
        and I_EventCounter ring_udun = 1
            set_event_counter ring_assault 1
            set_event_counter ring_gate 1
        end_if
        
        if I_EventCounter ring_assault = 0
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_elrond = 1
                console_command character_reset elrond_1
                move elrond_1, 345, 251
                log always ----------elrond moved 1 ------------------
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_glorfindel = 1
                console_command character_reset glorfindel_1
                move glorfindel_1, 345, 251
                log always ----------glorfindel_1 moved 1 ------------------
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_cirdan = 1
                console_command character_reset cirdan_1
                move cirdan_1, 345, 251
                log always ----------cirdan_1 moved 1 ------------------
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_celeborn = 1
                console_command character_reset celeborn_1
                move celeborn_1, 345, 251
                log always ----------celeborn_1 moved 1 ------------------
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_aragorn = 1
                console_command character_reset aragorn_1
                move aragorn_1, 345, 251
                log always ----------aragorn_1 moved 1 ------------------
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_gandalf1 = 1
                console_command character_reset gandalf_1
                move gandalf_1, 345, 251
                log always ----------gandalf_1 moved 1 ------------------
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_gandalf2 = 1
                console_command character_reset gandalf_2
                move gandalf_2, 345, 251
                log always ----------gandalf_2 moved 1 ------------------
            end_if
        end_if
        
        if I_EventCounter ring_gate = 1
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_elrond = 1
                console_command character_reset elrond_1
                move elrond_1, 359, 233
                console_command mp elrond_1 30
                log always ----------elrond moved 2 ------------------
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_glorfindel = 1
                console_command character_reset glorfindel_1
                move glorfindel_1, 359, 233
                console_command mp glorfindel_1 30
                point_at_character glorfindel_1
                log always ----------glorfindel_1 moved 2 ------------------
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_cirdan = 1
                console_command character_reset cirdan_1
                move cirdan_1, 359, 233
                console_command mp cirdan_1 30
                log always ----------cirdan_1 moved 2 ------------------
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_celeborn = 1
                console_command character_reset celeborn_1
                move celeborn_1, 359, 233
                console_command mp celeborn_1 30
                log always ----------celeborn_1 moved 2 ------------------
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_aragorn = 1
                console_command character_reset aragorn_1
                move aragorn_1, 359, 233
                console_command mp aragorn_1 30
                log always ----------aragorn_1 moved 2 ------------------
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_gandalf1 = 1
                console_command character_reset gandalf_1
                move gandalf_1, 359, 233
                console_command mp gandalf_1 30
                log always ----------gandalf_1 moved 2 ------------------
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_gandalf2 = 1
                console_command character_reset gandalf_2
                move gandalf_2, 359, 233
                console_command mp gandalf_2 30
                log always ----------gandalf_2 moved 2 ------------------
            end_if
        end_if
        
    end_monitor
    
    monitor_event CharacterTurnStart HasAncType relic_ring
    and IsRegionOneOf Udun_Province
    and not CharacterIsLocal
    and I_EventCounter ring_given_ai = 1
    and I_CompareCounter ring_held_destroy >= 25
    
        if I_EventCounter ring_destroyed = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        
        if I_EventCounter destroy_impossible = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        
        set_event_counter ring_udun 1
        
        if I_SettlementUnderSiege Udun
        and I_EventCounter ring_siege = 1
        and I_CompareCounter udun_check = 0
        and I_EventCounter ring_assault = 0
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_elrond = 1
                siege_settlement, elrond_1, Udun, attack
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_glorfindel = 1
                siege_settlement, glorfindel_1, Udun, attack
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_cirdan = 1
                siege_settlement, cirdan_1, Udun, attack
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_celeborn = 1
                siege_settlement, celeborn_1, Udun, attack
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_aragorn = 1
                siege_settlement, aragorn_1, Udun, attack
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_gandalf1 = 1
                siege_settlement, gandalf_1, Udun, attack
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_gandalf2 = 1
                siege_settlement, gandalf_2, Udun, attack
            end_if
            set_event_counter ring_assault 1
        end_if
        
        if not I_SettlementUnderSiege Udun
        and I_CompareCounter udun_check = 0
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_elrond = 1
                siege_settlement, elrond_1, Udun, maintain
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_glorfindel = 1
                siege_settlement, glorfindel_1, Udun, maintain
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_cirdan = 1
                siege_settlement, cirdan_1, Udun, maintain
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_celeborn = 1
                siege_settlement, celeborn_1, Udun, maintain
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_aragorn = 1
                siege_settlement, aragorn_1, Udun, maintain
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_gandalf1 = 1
                siege_settlement, gandalf_1, Udun, maintain
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_gandalf2 = 1
                siege_settlement, gandalf_2, Udun, maintain
            end_if
            set_event_counter ring_siege 1
        end_if
        
    end_monitor
    
    monitor_event CharacterTurnStart HasAncType relic_ring
    and not EndedInSettlement
    and not CharacterIsLocal
    and I_EventCounter ring_given_ai = 1
    and I_CompareCounter ring_held_destroy >= 25
    
        if I_EventCounter ring_destroyed = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        
        if I_EventCounter destroy_impossible = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        
        if I_CompareCounter udun_check = 1
        and I_EventCounter ring_udun = 1
            set_event_counter ring_assault 1
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_elrond = 1
                console_command move_character elrond_1 348 246
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_glorfindel = 1
                console_command move_character glorfindel_1 348 246
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_cirdan = 1
                console_command move_character cirdan_1 348 246
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_celeborn = 1
                console_command move_character celeborn_1 348 246
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_aragorn = 1
                console_command move_character aragorn_1 348 246
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_gandalf1 = 1
                console_command move_character gandalf_1 348 246
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_gandalf2 = 1
                console_command move_character gandalf_2 348 246
            end_if
        end_if
        
        if I_EventCounter elrond_army_spawn = 0
        and I_EventCounter ring_assault = 0
        and I_EventCounter ring_given_elrond = 1
            console_command create_unit elrond_1 "Dunedain Wardens" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit elrond_1 "Amanyar Swordmasters" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit elrond_1 "Noldorin Archers" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit elrond_1 "Noldorin Veterans" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit elrond_1 "Elderinwe Tirno" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit elrond_1 "Elderinwe Roquen" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit elrond_1 "Elven Catapult" 2 3 1 1
            set_event_counter elrond_army_spawn 1
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter elrond_army_spawn2 = 0
        and I_EventCounter ring_gate = 1
        and I_EventCounter ring_given_elrond = 1
            console_command create_unit elrond_1 "Dunedain Wardens" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit elrond_1 "Amanyar Swordmasters" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit elrond_1 "Noldorin Archers" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit elrond_1 "Noldorin Veterans" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit elrond_1 "Elderinwe Tirno" 4 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit elrond_1 "Elderinwe Roquen" 4 3 1 1
            set_event_counter elrond_army_spawn2 1
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter glorfindel_army_spawn = 0
        and I_EventCounter ring_assault = 0
        and I_EventCounter ring_given_glorfindel = 1
            console_command create_unit glorfindel_1 "Dunedain Wardens" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit glorfindel_1 "Amanyar Swordmasters" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit glorfindel_1 "Noldorin Archers" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit glorfindel_1 "Noldorin Veterans" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit glorfindel_1 "Elderinwe Tirno" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit glorfindel_1 "Elderinwe Roquen" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit glorfindel_1 "Elven Catapult" 2 3 1 1
            set_event_counter glorfindel_army_spawn 1
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter glorfindel_army_spawn2 = 0
        and I_EventCounter ring_gate = 1
        and I_EventCounter ring_given_glorfindel = 1
            console_command create_unit glorfindel_1 "Dunedain Wardens" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit glorfindel_1 "Amanyar Swordmasters" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit glorfindel_1 "Noldorin Archers" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit glorfindel_1 "Noldorin Veterans" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit glorfindel_1 "Elderinwe Tirno" 4 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit glorfindel_1 "Elderinwe Roquen" 4 3 1 1
            set_event_counter glorfindel_army_spawn2 1
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter cirdan_army_spawn = 0
        and I_EventCounter ring_assault = 0
        and I_EventCounter ring_given_cirdan = 1
            console_command create_unit cirdan_1 "Dunedain Wardens" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit cirdan_1 "Amanyar Swordmasters" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit cirdan_1 "Noldorin Archers" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit cirdan_1 "Noldorin Veterans" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit cirdan_1 "Elderinwe Tirno" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit cirdan_1 "Elderinwe Roquen" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit cirdan_1 "Elven Catapult" 2 3 1 1
            set_event_counter cirdan_army_spawn 1
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter cirdan_army_spawn2 = 0
        and I_EventCounter ring_gate = 1
        and I_EventCounter ring_given_cirdan = 1
            console_command create_unit cirdan_1 "Dunedain Wardens" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit cirdan_1 "Amanyar Swordmasters" 3 3  1
            console_command create_unit cirdan_1 "Noldorin Archers" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit cirdan_1 "Noldorin Veterans" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit cirdan_1 "Elderinwe Tirno" 4 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit cirdan_1 "Elderinwe Roquen" 4 3 1 1
            set_event_counter cirdan_army_spawn2 1
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter celeborn_army_spawn = 0
        and I_EventCounter ring_assault = 0
        and I_EventCounter ring_given_celeborn = 1
            console_command create_unit celeborn_1 "Lorien Archers" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit celeborn_1 "Galadhrim Swordsmen" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit celeborn_1 "Galadhrim Archers" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit celeborn_1 "Galadhrim Guards" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit celeborn_1 "Berio I Ngelaidh" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit celeborn_1 "Lorien Lancers" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit celeborn_1 "Elven Catapult" 2 3 1 1
            set_event_counter celeborn_army_spawn 1
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter celeborn_army_spawn2 = 0
        and I_EventCounter ring_gate = 1
        and I_EventCounter ring_given_celeborn = 1
            console_command create_unit celeborn_1 "Lorien Archers" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit celeborn_1 "Galadhrim Swordsmen" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit celeborn_1 "Galadhrim Archers" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit celeborn_1 "Galadhrim Guards" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit celeborn_1 "Berio I Ngelaidh" 4 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit celeborn_1 "Lorien Lancers" 4 3 1 1
            set_event_counter celeborn_army_spawn2 1
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter aragorn_army_spawn = 0
        and I_EventCounter ring_assault = 0
        and I_EventCounter ring_given_aragorn = 1
            console_command create_unit aragorn_1 "Arthedain Footmen" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit aragorn_1 "Dunedain Rangers" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit aragorn_1 "Dunedain Steelbowmen" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit aragorn_1 "Arthedain Knights" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit aragorn_1 "Sons of Numenor" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit aragorn_1 "Arthedain Royal Guard" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit aragorn_1 "Westron Catapult" 2 3 1 1
            set_event_counter aragorn_army_spawn 1
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter aragorn_army_spawn2 = 0
        and I_EventCounter ring_gate = 1
        and I_EventCounter ring_given_aragorn = 1
            console_command create_unit aragorn_1 "Arthedain Footmen" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit aragorn_1 "Dunedain Rangers" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit aragorn_1 "Dunedain Steelbowmen" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit aragorn_1 "Arthedain Knights" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit aragorn_1 "Sons of Numenor" 4 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit aragorn_1 "Arthedain Royal Guard" 4 3 1 1
            set_event_counter aragorn_army_spawn2 1
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter gandalf1_army_spawn = 0
        and I_EventCounter ring_assault = 0
        and I_EventCounter ring_given_gandalf1 = 1
            console_command create_unit gandalf_1 "Arthedain Footmen" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit gandalf_1 "Dunedain Rangers" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit gandalf_1 "Dunedain Steelbowmen" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit gandalf_1 "Arthedain Knights" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit gandalf_1 "Sons of Numenor" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit gandalf_1 "Arthedain Royal Guard" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit gandalf_1 "Westron Catapult" 2 3 1 1
            set_event_counter gandalf1_army_spawn 1
        end_if                                         
        if I_EventCounter gandalf1_army_spawn2 = 0
        and I_EventCounter ring_gate = 1           
        and I_EventCounter ring_given_gandalf1 = 1
            console_command create_unit gandalf_1 "Arthedain Footmen" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit gandalf_1 "Dunedain Rangers" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit gandalf_1 "Dunedain Steelbowmen" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit gandalf_1 "Arthedain Knights" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit gandalf_1 "Sons of Numenor" 4 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit gandalf_1 "Arthedain Royal Guard" 4 3 1 1
            set_event_counter gandalf1_army_spawn2 1
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter aragorn_army_spawn = 0
        and I_EventCounter ring_assault = 0
        and I_EventCounter ring_given_gandalf2 = 1
            console_command create_unit gandalf_2 "Arthedain Footmen" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit gandalf_2 "Dunedain Rangers" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit gandalf_2 "Dunedain Steelbowmen" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit gandalf_2 "Arthedain Knights" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit gandalf_2 "Sons of Numenor" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit gandalf_2 "Arthedain Royal Guard" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit gandalf_2 "Westron Catapult" 2 3 1 1
            set_event_counter gandalf2_army_spawn 1
        end_if                                         
        if I_EventCounter gandalf2_army_spawn2 = 0
        and I_EventCounter ring_gate = 1           
        and I_EventCounter ring_given_gandalf2 = 1
            console_command create_unit gandalf_2 "Arthedain Footmen" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit gandalf_2 "Dunedain Rangers" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit gandalf_2 "Dunedain Steelbowmen" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit gandalf_2 "Arthedain Knights" 3 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit gandalf_2 "Sons of Numenor" 4 3 1 1
            console_command create_unit gandalf_2 "Arthedain Royal Guard" 4 3 1 1
            set_event_counter gandalf2_army_spawn2 1
        end_if
    end_monitor
    
    monitor_event CharacterTurnStart HasAncType relic_ring
    and IsRegionOneOf Gorgoroth_Province
    and TimeInRegion > 3
    and I_EventCounter ring_given_ai = 1
    and not CharacterIsLocal
    
        if I_EventCounter ring_destroyed = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        
        if I_EventCounter destroy_impossible = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        
        if RandomPercent <= 20
            set_event_counter mordor_ring_ai 1
            set_event_counter ring_given 0
            set_event_counter ring_given_ai 0
            set_event_counter ring_given_he 0
            set_event_counter ring_given_lorien 0
            set_event_counter ring_given_nd 0
            console_command remove_ancillary cirdan_1 one_ring
            console_command remove_ancillary glorfindel_1 one_ring
            console_command remove_ancillary celeborn_1 one_ring
            console_command remove_ancillary aragorn_1 one_ring
            console_command remove_ancillary gandalf_1 one_ring
            console_command remove_ancillary gandalf_2 one_ring
            console_command remove_ancillary elrond_1 one_ring
            set_event_counter ring_transfer 1
            historic_event ring_destroyed_failed_evil factions { poland, england, france, aztecs, teutonic_order, venice, spain, khand, portugal, hre, }
            historic_event ring_destroyed_failed factions { turks, saxons, mongols, ireland, }
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_elrond = 1
                set_event_counter ring_given_elrond 0
                kill_character elrond_1
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_gandalf1 = 1
                set_event_counter ring_given_gandalf1 0
                kill_character gandalf_1
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_gandalf2 = 1
                set_event_counter ring_given_gandalf2 0
                kill_character gandalf_2
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_aragorn = 1
                set_event_counter ring_given_aragorn 0
                kill_character aragorn_1
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_celeborn = 1
                set_event_counter ring_given_celeborn 0
                kill_character celeborn_1
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_glorfindel = 1
                set_event_counter ring_given_glorfindel 0
                kill_character glorfindel_1
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_given_cirdan = 1
                set_event_counter ring_given_cirdan 0
                kill_character cirdan_1
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter ring_destroyed_failed = 0
            historic_event ring_destroyed factions { all, }
            set_counter ring_held_destroy 0
            set_event_counter ring_given 0
            set_event_counter ring_given_ai 0
            set_event_counter ring_given_he 0
            set_event_counter ring_given_nd 0
            set_event_counter ring_given_lorien 0
            set_event_counter ring_given_elrond 0
            set_event_counter ring_given_gandalf1 0
            set_event_counter ring_given_gandalf2 0

            set_event_counter ring_given_aragorn 0
            set_event_counter ring_given_celeborn 0
            set_event_counter ring_given_glorfindel 0
            set_event_counter ring_given_cirdan 0
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        
    end_monitor
    
    ;Saruman gets the ring (AI)

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType france
        and I_EventCounter saruman_ring_ai > 0
        log always --------------------------- ai ring saruman script------------------------
        set_event_counter destroy_ring_ai 0
        set_event_counter mordor_ring_ai 0
        if I_CompareCounter ring_end == 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_CharacterExists saruman_1
            if I_IsFactionAIControlled france
                inc_counter ring_held_saruman 1
                point_at_character saruman_1
                character_flash_start saruman_1
            end_if
            console_command give_ancillary saruman_1 one_ring
            if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists one_ring
                console_command remove_ancillary saruman_1 saruman_ring
                console_command give_ancillary saruman_1 one_ring
            end_if
            set_event_counter ring_transfer 0
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled france
                set_counter ring_held_saruman 12
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter ring_held_saruman == 12
            historic_event saruman_ring_event factions { all, }
            ;console_command remove_trait saruman_1 Locked
            ui_flash_stop
            character_flash_stop saruman_1
            set_counter ring_held_saruman 0

            add_money france 18000
            increment_kings_purse france 3500
            console_command give_trait saruman_1 Saruman 2
            console_command give_trait saruman_1 SarumanEpithet 2

            set_faction_standing france saxons -1

        end_if
        if not I_CharacterExists saruman_1
            set_event_counter saruman_ring_ai 0
            set_counter ring_held_saruman 0
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

        and I_EventCounter mordor_ring_ai > 0

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
    and I_EventCounter ring_destroyed = 1
        log always --------------------------- ring destroyed camera stuff-----------------------

        disable_cursor
        disable_shortcuts true
        
        hide_ui
        reveal_tile 361, 231
        move_strat_camera 361, 236
        campaign_wait 0.3
        zoom_strat_camera 0.6
        campaign_wait 3.3
        show_ui
        historic_event mount_doom event/ring_destroyed.bik
        campaign_wait 0.1
        hide_ui
        campaign_wait 25
        console_command clear_messages
        campaign_wait 0.1
        show_ui
        campaign_wait 0.1
        hide_ui
        add_events
            event volcano ring_eruption
            date 0
            position 361, 231
        end_add_events
        campaign_wait 5
        console_command clear_messages
        show_ui
        
        historic_event ring_destroyed event/evil_loose.bik
        campaign_wait 0.1
        hide_ui
        campaign_wait 75
        console_command clear_messages
        historic_event mordor_destroyed 
        campaign_wait 1
        disable_movie_view
        campaign_wait 0.1
        show_ui
        enable_cursor
        disable_shortcuts false
        increment_kings_purse hre -2000
        increment_kings_purse portugal -2000
        increment_kings_purse france -4000
        increment_kings_purse spain -2000
        increment_kings_purse venice -2000
        if I_EventCounter blue_wizards_fail = 1
            increment_kings_purse khand -2000
        end_if
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
    
    monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType mordor_destroyed
        log always --------------------------- mordor is destroyed ---------------------------
		if I_EventCounter mordor_destroyed = 1

    ;Spy networks telling player if conditions are met which faction has the ring

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
        and I_CompareCounter ring_possesion_ai = 1
        log always --------------------------- spy network message monitor ---------------------------
        if I_CompareCounter ring_end == 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter one_ring_gondor = 1
            and I_EventCounter spy_network_gondor = 1
            and I_EventCounter ring_found_gondor = 0
            historic_event ring_found_gondor
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter one_ring_da = 1
            and I_EventCounter spy_network_da = 1
            and I_EventCounter ring_found_da = 0
            historic_event ring_found_da
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter one_ring_rohan = 1
            and I_EventCounter spy_network_rohan = 1
            and I_EventCounter ring_found_rohan = 0

    ;Player has the one ring consequences
    
    monitor_event CharacterTurnStart CharacterIsLocal
    and HasAncType relic_ring
    and I_EventCounter is_the_ai = 0
        log always --------------------------- player has the ring consequences---------------------------
        if I_CompareCounter ring_end == 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter mordor_ring_faction = 1
            if I_EventCounter one_ring_acquired_mordor = 0
                historic_event one_ring_acquired_mordor
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter sauron_ai = 0
                set_event_counter mordor_deliver_active_self 1
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter evil_ring_faction = 1
            if I_EventCounter one_ring_acquired_evil = 0
                historic_event one_ring_acquired_evil
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter player_keeps_ring_evil = 0
            and I_EventCounter sauron_ai = 0
                set_event_counter mordor_deliver_active 1
            end_if
            inc_counter one_ring_player_timer 1
            if I_CompareCounter one_ring_player_timer == 60
            and I_CompareCounter faction_ID_england == 0
                set_event_counter deliver_evil_player 0
                historic_event player_keeps_ring_evil
                console_command message_collation_set on
                if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_spain == 1
                    set_event_counter harad_keeps_ring 1
                    add_money spain 10000
                    increment_kings_purse spain 2000
                    set_faction_standing spain england -1
                    set_faction_standing spain france -1
                    set_faction_standing spain venice -1
                    set_faction_standing spain hre -1
                    set_faction_standing spain portugal -1
                    set_faction_standing spain aztecs -1
                    set_faction_standing spain poland -1
                    set_faction_standing spain saxons -1
                    set_faction_standing spain mongols -1
                    set_faction_standing spain ireland -1
                    set_faction_standing spain turks -1
                    set_faction_standing england spain -1
                    set_faction_standing france spain -1
                    set_faction_standing venice spain -1
                    set_faction_standing hre spain -1

                    set_faction_standing aztecs spain -1
                    set_faction_standing poland spain -1
                    set_faction_standing saxons spain -1

                    set_faction_standing ireland spain -1
                    set_faction_standing turks spain -1

                    console_command diplomatic_stance spain papal_states war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance spain france war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance spain venice war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance spain hre war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance spain portugal war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance spain aztecs war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance spain poland war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance spain saxons war

                    console_command diplomatic_stance spain ireland war
                    console_command diplomatic_stance spain turks war
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_venice == 1
                    set_event_counter rhun_keeps_ring 1
                    add_money venice 10000
                    increment_kings_purse venice 2000
                    set_faction_standing venice england -1

                    set_faction_standing spain venice -1
                    set_faction_standing hre venice -1

                    set_faction_standing aztecs venice -1
                    set_faction_standing poland venice -1
                    set_faction_standing saxons venice -1
                    set_faction_standing mongols venice -1
                    set_faction_standing ireland venice -1
                    set_faction_standing turks venice -1

                    console_command diplomatic_stance venice hre war

        and I_EventCounter ring_given = 0
            if I_EventCounter one_ring_acquired_good = 0
                historic_event one_ring_acquired_good
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter player_keeps_ring_good = 0
            and I_EventCounter ring_destroyed = 0
                set_event_counter ring_deliver_active 1
            end_if

            if I_CompareCounter one_ring_player_timer == 60
            and I_CompareCounter faction_ID_ireland == 0
            and I_CompareCounter faction_ID_mongols == 0
            and I_CompareCounter faction_ID_saxons == 0
            and I_CompareCounter faction_ID_turks == 0
                set_event_counter ring_deliver_good 0
                historic_event player_keeps_ring_good
                console_command message_collation_set on

                    set_event_counter gondor_keeps_ring 1
                    add_money sicily 10000
                    increment_kings_purse sicily 2000
                    set_faction_standing sicily england -1
                    set_faction_standing sicily france -1

    set_event_counter ring_deliver_good 0
    
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
        log always --------------------------- player has the ring good---------------------------
        if I_CompareCounter ring_end == 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter one_ring_acquired_good = 1
        and I_EventCounter ring_deliver_good = 0
        and I_EventCounter ring_deliver_active = 1
            if I_CompareCounter imladris_safe_check == 1
                historic_event ring_deliver_good
                point_at_settlement Imladris
                snap_strat_camera 246, 384
                set_event_counter ring_deliver_imladris 1
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_deliver_imladris = 0
            and I_CompareCounter lorien_safe_check == 1
                historic_event ring_deliver_good
                point_at_settlement Celebrant
                snap_strat_camera 268, 327
                set_event_counter ring_deliver_lorien 1
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_deliver_lorien = 0
            and I_EventCounter ring_deliver_imladris = 0
            and I_CompareCounter mithlond_safe_check == 1
                historic_event ring_deliver_good
                point_at_settlement Mithlond
                snap_strat_camera 81, 382
                set_event_counter ring_deliver_mithlond 1
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter ring_deliver_imladris = 1
        and I_EventCounter ring_deliver_active = 1
        and I_EventCounter ring_deliver_good = 1
        and I_EventCounter council_start = 0
            point_at_settlement Imladris 
            set_event_counter ring_deliver_mithlond 0
            set_event_counter ring_deliver_lorien 0
            if I_CompareCounter imladris_safe_check == 0
                set_event_counter ring_deliver_good 0
                set_event_counter ring_deliver_imladris 0
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter ring_deliver_good = 1
        and I_EventCounter ring_deliver_lorien = 1
        and I_EventCounter ring_deliver_active = 1
        and I_EventCounter council_start = 0
            point_at_settlement Celebrant 
            set_event_counter ring_deliver_mithlond 0
            set_event_counter ring_deliver_imladris 0
            if I_CompareCounter lorien_safe_check == 0
                set_event_counter ring_deliver_good 0
                set_event_counter ring_deliver_lorien 0
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter ring_deliver_good = 1
        and I_EventCounter ring_deliver_mithlond = 1
        and I_EventCounter ring_deliver_active = 1
        and I_EventCounter council_start = 0
            point_at_settlement Mithlond 
            set_event_counter ring_deliver_imladris 0
            set_event_counter ring_deliver_lorien 0
            if I_CompareCounter mithlond_safe_check == 0
                set_event_counter ring_deliver_good 0
                set_event_counter ring_deliver_mithlond 0
            end_if
        end_if
    end_monitor
    
    monitor_event CharacterTurnStart CharacterIsLocal
    and IsRegionOneOf Imladris_Province
    and HasAncType relic_ring
    and I_EventCounter ring_deliver_imladris = 1
    and I_EventCounter council_start = 0
        log always --------------------------- ring to imladris---------------------------
        ui_flash_stop
        historic_event council_start
        set_event_counter QuestToDestroyRing 1
        disable_cursor
        disable_shortcuts true
        select_ui_element faction_button
        simulate_mouse_click lclick_up
        hide_ui
        snap_strat_camera 361, 233 ; Mount Doom's coordinates.
        point_at_strat_position 361, 233
        campaign_wait 0.1
        show_ui
        enable_cursor
        disable_shortcuts false
    end_monitor

        log always --------------------------- evil player has ring monitor---------------------------

            set_event_counter deliver_evil_player 0
            set_event_counter deliver_ring_mordor 0

        end_if

        and I_EventCounter one_ring_acquired_mordor = 1

        end_if

        and I_EventCounter mordor_deliver_active_self = 1
            point_at_settlement Gorgoroth
        end_if

        and I_EventCounter deliver_evil_player = 0

            snap_strat_camera 346, 250
            historic_event deliver_evil_player
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter deliver_evil_player = 1
        and I_EventCounter mordor_deliver_active = 1
            point_at_settlement Udun
        end_if

            ui_flash_stop
            historic_event sauron_ai event/sauron.bik
            set_event_counter mordor_ring_ai 0
            set_event_counter sauron_spawn 0

                create_unit sauron_1, Black Uruk Halberds,	num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0

                create_unit sauron_1, Morannon Guard,		num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                create_unit sauron_1, Black Uruk Archers,		num 3, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                create_unit sauron_1, Olog-hai,		num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0

            end_if

                    faction england
                    character	Sauron, named character, age 18, x 370, y 232, family, portrait sauron, battle_model elephant_crew3, hero_ability SAURON, label sauron_4
                    traits		Sauron 1, CustomBG 1, Hero 1, MaiaRace 1, FactionLeaderCustom 1, HeroAbilitySauron 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 6, DeceiverVirtue 3, GoodAttacker 4, GoodDefender 3, GoodCommander 4, HaleAndHearty 3, NightBattleCapable 1, InspiringSpeaker 3, Brave 4, SauronEpithet 1
                    unit		Sauron			    soldiers 1	 exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                create_unit sauron_4, Black Uruk Halberds,	num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                create_unit sauron_4, Black Uruks,		num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                create_unit sauron_4, Orc Raiders,	num 4, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                create_unit sauron_4, Orc Maulers,		num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                create_unit sauron_4, Orc Band,		num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                create_unit sauron_4, Morannon Guard,		num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                create_unit sauron_4, Black Uruk Archers,		num 3, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                create_unit sauron_4, Olog-hai,		num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                console_command give_ancillary sauron_4 one_ring
                set_event_counter ring_transfer 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter sauron_return == 4
                spawn_army
                    faction england
                    character	Sauron, named character, age 18, x 370, y 232, family, portrait sauron, battle_model elephant_crew3, hero_ability SAURON, label sauron_5
                    traits		Sauron 1, CustomBG 1, Hero 1, MaiaRace 1, FactionLeaderCustom 1, HeroAbilitySauron 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 6, DeceiverVirtue 3, GoodAttacker 4, GoodDefender 3, GoodCommander 4, HaleAndHearty 3, NightBattleCapable 1, InspiringSpeaker 3, Brave 4, SauronEpithet 1
                    unit		Sauron			    soldiers 1	 exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                create_unit sauron_5, Black Uruk Halberds,	num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                create_unit sauron_5, Black Uruks,		num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                create_unit sauron_5, Orc Raiders,	num 4, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                create_unit sauron_5, Orc Maulers,		num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                create_unit sauron_5, Orc Band,		num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                create_unit sauron_5, Morannon Guard,		num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                create_unit sauron_5, Black Uruk Archers,		num 3, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                create_unit sauron_5, Olog-hai,		num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                console_command give_ancillary sauron_5 one_ring
                set_event_counter ring_transfer 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter sauron_return == 5
                spawn_army
                    faction england
                    character	Sauron, named character, age 18, x 370, y 232, family, portrait sauron, battle_model elephant_crew3, hero_ability SAURON, label sauron_6
                    traits		Sauron 1, CustomBG 1, Hero 1, MaiaRace 1, FactionLeaderCustom 1, HeroAbilitySauron 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 6, DeceiverVirtue 3, GoodAttacker 4, GoodDefender 3, GoodCommander 4, HaleAndHearty 3, NightBattleCapable 1, InspiringSpeaker 3, Brave 4, SauronEpithet 1
                    unit		Sauron			    soldiers 1	 exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                create_unit sauron_6, Black Uruk Halberds,	num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                create_unit sauron_6, Black Uruks,		num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                create_unit sauron_6, Orc Raiders,	num 4, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                create_unit sauron_6, Orc Maulers,		num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                create_unit sauron_6, Orc Band,		num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                create_unit sauron_6, Morannon Guard,		num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                create_unit sauron_6, Black Uruk Archers,		num 3, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                create_unit sauron_6, Olog-hai,		num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                console_command give_ancillary sauron_6 one_ring
                set_event_counter ring_transfer 0
            end_if
            inc_counter sauron_return 1
            set_event_counter ring_transfer 0
            console_command message_collation_set on
            console_command diplomatic_stance england sicily war
            console_command diplomatic_stance england milan war
            console_command diplomatic_stance england scotland war
            console_command diplomatic_stance england turks war
            console_command diplomatic_stance england mongols war
            console_command diplomatic_stance england moors war
            console_command diplomatic_stance england russia war
            console_command diplomatic_stance england norway war
            console_command diplomatic_stance england denmark war
            console_command diplomatic_stance england timurids war
            console_command diplomatic_stance england normans war
            console_command diplomatic_stance england hungary war
            console_command diplomatic_stance england saxons war
            console_command diplomatic_stance england ireland war
            console_command diplomatic_stance england byzantium war
            console_command diplomatic_stance england teutonic_order war
            add_money england 10000
            increment_kings_purse england 5000
            increment_kings_purse poland 1000
            increment_kings_purse hre 1000
            increment_kings_purse portugal 1000
            increment_kings_purse venice 500
            increment_kings_purse spain 500
            if I_EventCounter blue_wizards_fail = 1
                increment_kings_purse khand 500
            end_if
			set_event_counter deliver_evil_player 0
			set_event_counter deliver_ring_mordor 0
            console_command message_collation_set off
            if I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
                give_everything_to_faction poland england false
            end_if
        end_if
    end_monitor 
    
    monitor_event CharacterTurnStart CharacterIsLocal
    and HasAncType relic_ring
    and IsRegionOneOf Nan_Curunir_Province
    and I_EventCounter ring_deliver_isengard = 1
        log always --------------------------- ring to isengard---------------------------
        e_select_character
        console_command remove_ancillary this one_ring
        set_event_counter ring_transfer 1
        ui_flash_stop
        set_event_counter saruman_manycolours_spawn 1
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
    
    monitor_event CharacterTurnStart CharacterIsLocal
    and HasAncType relic_ring
    and IsRegionOneOf Nan_Curunir_Province
    and I_EventCounter ring_deliver_saruman = 1
        log always --------------------------- ring to isengard (isengard player)---------------------------
        e_select_character
        console_command remove_ancillary this one_ring
        set_event_counter ring_transfer 1
        ui_flash_stop
        set_event_counter saruman_manycolours_spawn 1
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
    
    set_event_counter ring_deliver_saruman 0
    set_event_counter ring_deliver_isengard 0
    
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
        log always --------------------------- saruman player has ring monitor---------------------------
        if I_CompareCounter ring_end == 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter saruman_ring_impossible = 1
            set_event_counter ring_deliver_isengard 0
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter ring_deliver_saruman = 0
        and I_EventCounter one_ring_acquired_saruman = 1
        and I_EventCounter isengard_deliver_active_self = 1
        and I_EventCounter saruman_ring_ai = 0
            point_at_settlement Nan_Curunir
            snap_strat_camera 224, 279
            historic_event ring_deliver_saruman
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter ring_deliver_saruman = 1
        and I_EventCounter isengard_deliver_active_self = 1
            point_at_settlement Nan_Curunir
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter one_ring_acquired_isengard = 1
        and I_EventCounter ring_deliver_isengard = 0
        and I_EventCounter isengard_deliver_active = 1
            point_at_settlement Nan_Curunir
            snap_strat_camera 224, 279
            historic_event ring_deliver_isengard
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter ring_deliver_isengard = 1
        and I_EventCounter isengard_deliver_active = 1
            point_at_settlement Nan_Curunir
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter saruman_manycolours_spawn = 1
            historic_event saruman_ring_event
            console_command remove_trait saruman_1 Locked
            ui_flash_stop
            character_flash_stop saruman_1
            historic_event nazgul_leave_sauron
            set_counter ring_held_saruman 0
            set_event_counter saruman_manycolours_spawn 0
            set_event_counter saruman_ring_ai 0
            add_money france 18000
            increment_kings_purse france 3500
            console_command give_trait saruman_1 Saruman 2
            console_command give_trait saruman_1 SarumanEpithet 2
            console_command message_collation_set on
            set_faction_standing france saxons -1
            set_faction_standing france ireland -1
            set_faction_standing france turks -1
            set_faction_standing france milan -1
            set_faction_standing france sicily -1
            set_faction_standing france england -1
            set_faction_standing france portugal -1
            set_faction_standing france denmark -1 
            set_faction_standing france mongols -1
            set_faction_standing france poland -1
            set_faction_standing france papal_states -1
            set_faction_standing mongols france -1
            set_faction_standing saxons france -1
            set_faction_standing turks france -1
            set_faction_standing milan france -1
            set_faction_standing sicily france -1
            set_faction_standing england france -1
            set_faction_standing portugal france -1
            set_faction_standing denmark france -1
            set_faction_standing poland france -1
            set_faction_standing papal_states france -1
            console_command diplomatic_stance france mongols war
            console_command diplomatic_stance france saxons war
            console_command diplomatic_stance france ireland war
            console_command diplomatic_stance france turks war
            console_command diplomatic_stance france milan war
            console_command diplomatic_stance france sicily war
            console_command diplomatic_stance france england war
            console_command diplomatic_stance france portugal war
            console_command diplomatic_stance france denmark war
            console_command diplomatic_stance france poland war
            console_command diplomatic_stance france papal_states war
            console_command message_collation_set off
            console_command give_ancillary saruman_1 one_ring
            if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists one_ring
                console_command remove_ancillary saruman_1 saruman_ring
                console_command give_ancillary saruman_1 one_ring
            end_if
            set_event_counter ring_transfer 0
        end_if
    end_monitor 
    
    monitor_event CharacterTurnStart CharacterIsLocal
    and HasAncType relic_ring
    and Trait Sauron = 0
    
        if I_CompareCounter ring_end = 1
            e_select_character
            console_command remove_ancillary this one_ring
        end_if
    
        if I_EventCounter sauron_ai = 1
            e_select_character
            console_command remove_ancillary this one_ring
        end_if
        
    end_monitor

    and FactionType england
        log always --------------------------- send nazgul away---------------------------
        console_command move_character z1, 478 472

        console_command move_character z3, 480 472
        console_command move_character z7, 479 471
        console_command move_character z8, 478 471

    ;Player Mordor Nazgûl Return
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType england	
        log always --------------------------- nazgul return monitor---------------------------
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled england
            set_event_counter nazgul_return_1 1
            set_event_counter nazgul_return_2 1
            set_event_counter nazgul_return_3 1
            set_event_counter nazgul_return_4 1
            set_event_counter nazgul_return_5 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
	    if I_TurnNumber >= 50
        and I_EventCounter nazgul_return_5 = 0
            console_command move_character z1, 371 235
		    historic_event nazgul_return_5
            increment_kings_purse england -150
		    terminate_monitor
        end_if
	    if I_TurnNumber >= 40
        and I_EventCounter nazgul_return_4 = 0
            console_command move_character z2, 373 227
		    historic_event nazgul_return_4
            increment_kings_purse england -150
        end_if
	    if I_TurnNumber >= 30
        and I_EventCounter nazgul_return_3 = 0
            console_command move_character z3, 369 226
		    historic_event nazgul_return_3
            increment_kings_purse england -150
        end_if
	    if I_TurnNumber >= 20
        and I_EventCounter nazgul_return_2 = 0
            console_command move_character z7, 377 228
		    historic_event nazgul_return_2	
            increment_kings_purse england -150
        end_if
	    if I_TurnNumber >= 10
        and I_EventCounter nazgul_return_1 = 0
            console_command move_character z8, 373 226
		    historic_event nazgul_return_1
            increment_kings_purse england -150
        end_if
	end_monitor
    
    
    ;Witch-king to Angmar	
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType portugal
        log always --------------------------- Witch-king to Angmar	monitor---------------------------
        if I_EventCounter mordor_destroyed = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements portugal = 0
            set_event_counter nazgul_setoff_carndum 0
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
		if I_SettlementOwner Arthedain = portugal
        and I_SettlementOwner Imladris = portugal
        and I_SettlementOwner Carn_Dum = portugal
        and not I_EventCounter mordor_destroyed = 1
        and I_EventCounter nazgul_setoff_carndum = 0
			historic_event nazgul_setoff_carndum
            kill_character z1
            kill_character z1_1
            kill_character z1_2
            kill_character z1_3
            kill_character z1_4
            kill_character z1_5
            kill_character z1_6
            kill_character z1_7
            kill_character z1_8
            kill_character z1_9
            kill_character z1_10
		end_if
	end_monitor
    
    ; Dol Guldur Destroyed

        log always --------------------------- dg destroy nazgul monitor ---------------------------
        campaign_wait 0.1
        if I_NumberOfSettlements poland = 0
        and I_EventCounter nazgul_leave_sauron = 0
            set_event_counter dg_nazgul_to_mordor 1

    ;Nazgûl respawn for Mordor
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType england
    and I_SettlementOwner Gorgoroth = england
    and I_EventCounter nazgul_leave_sauron = 0

            terminate_monitor
        end_if

        and I_CompareCounter nazgula_dead = 0

                spawn_army
					faction england
					character	Nazgula, named character, age 16, x 370, y 232, direction W, portrait nazgul1, battle_model witchking, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Witch_King, label z1_1

					unit		Temple Knights		exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit 		Orc Band		exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Orc Scouts		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
				end

					console_command give_trait z1_1 AIBoost 1
				end_if

    ;Nazgûl respawn for Isengard
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType france
    and I_SettlementOwner Nan_Curunir = france
    and I_EventCounter nazgul_leave_sauron = 1
        log always ---------------------------Nazgûl respawn for Isengard monitor ---------------------------
        if not I_CharacterExists saruman_1
            set_event_counter nazgul_leave_sauron 0
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if not I_CharacterExists z1_isengard
        and I_EventCounter z1_spawned_isengard = 1
        and I_CompareCounter nazgula_dead_isengard = 0

                    unit		Castellans of Dol Guldur		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit 		Mirkwood Uruks		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                if I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
                    console_command give_trait z6_9_dg AIBoost 1
                end_if
                console_command give_ancillary z6_9_dg ring_nazgulf
                console_command give_ancillary z6_9_dg nazgul_sword
                set_counter z6_lost 0
                historic_event nazgul_returned_dolguldur
                inc_counter nazgulf_dead_dg 1
            end_if
        end_if
        if not I_CharacterExists z6_9_dg
        and I_EventCounter dg_nazgul_to_mordor = 0
        and I_CompareCounter nazgulf_dead_dg = 9

            if I_CompareCounter z6_lost >= 15

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType portugal
    and I_SettlementOwner Carn_Dum = portugal
    and I_EventCounter nazgul_leave_sauron = 0
    and I_EventCounter nazgul_setoff_carndum = 1
